text: Masculinity (also called manhood or manliness) is a set of attributes, behaviors, and roles associated with men and boys. There is evidence that some behaviors considered masculine are influenced by both cultural and biological factors. It is distinct from the definition of the biological male sex, as both males and females can exhibit masculine traits. Standards of masculinity vary across different cultures and historical periods. The colour blue is associated with masculinity in western culture. == References == Category:Gender Category:Sociology Category:Cultural anthropology
title: Masculinity
